Row.Field: This is short description of Java Developers
Experience in Java-Software-Development in a professional environment. Extensive programming experience in Java, J2EE technologies (Servlets, EJB). REST/SOAP Web Services
This is short description of .NET Developers

This is short description of PHP Developers
Have knowledge about OOP, design pattern. have knowledge about Framework cakePHP, Zend, CodeIgniter. Basic level at HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery.
